record.title: CHARLES GEORGE DEPARTMENT OF VETERANS AFFAIRS MEDICAL CENTER
record.narrative:
CHARLES GEORGE DEPARTMENT OF VETERANS AFFAIRS MEDICAL CENTER -- (Senate - November 01, 2007)

[Page: S13713]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Committee on Veterans' Affairs be discharged from further consideration of H.R. 2546 and the Senate proceed to its consideration.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered. The clerk will report the bill by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (H.R. 2546) to designate the Department of Veterans Affairs Medical Center in Asheville, North Carolina, as the "Charles George Department of Veterans Affairs Medical Center."
There being no objection, the Senate proceeded to consider the bill.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the bill be read a third time and passed, the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table, and any statements relating to this matter be printed in the Record.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
The bill (H.R. 2546) was ordered to a third reading, was read the third time, and passed.
